product_name: Mountain Hardwear La Strada Shorts - Women's
long_description: The La Strada shorts from Mountain Hardwear are made from sleek stretch fabric that's perfect when traveling. Durable stretch fabric offers comfortable movement; Durable Water Repellent finish repels moisture and stains. Fabric provides UPF 50+ sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Zip fly, button closure and belt loops. Mountain Hardwear La Strada shorts feature hand pockets and 2 envelope-style back pockets.
short_description: The La Strada shorts from Mountain Hardwear are made from sleek stretch fabric that's perfect when traveling.
